channel.title: Client.java?
channel.description:
every1 talks about it and some1 said it is the notepad labeled client so i mess with that and make my changes but nothing happens and the other thing labeled client i need to open with another program i can't find
so is this the right thing?if not what is client.java?

item.dc:creator: @pl0x_pk pl0x pk
item.description:
@pl0x_pk wrote:

i compiled it and nuthing happened and when i exited the notepad i chose to save and it still did nuthing and it still doesn’t work any help?also when i was done compiling it had said 100 errors

item.title: Client.java?
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

after editing your client you have to compile then run your server then all your changes should work unless you get errors when compiled

item.title: Client.java?
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

Client.java is just a notepad file were all your server’s main things go.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 25, 2007, 02:54:36 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Click Here, post:2, topic:61995”]so you edited client.java yeah? and nuthign worked. sounds to me you never saved it. then you never compiled. you need to compile before running the server for it to work.[/quote]Just about to say maby you didn’t use the “save” button or the “compile” button.

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

so you edited client.java yeah? and nuthign worked. sounds to me you never saved it. then you never compiled. you need to compile before running the server for it to work.

Read full topic
